numbered_ace_sentences: 1. There is a large gap between young men and young women in how often they reach out.
2. This gap is interesting.
3. In general, women reach out to their parents more often than men reach out to their parents.
4. The difference between the groups is larger for texting and phone calls than for in-person meetings.
5. An in-person meeting is the least popular communication method.
6. It is surprising that texting is not more popular.
7. It is surprising that calling is not more popular.
8. I expected a higher percentage of people to use texting.
9. Texting is accessible.
10. Texting is popular.
11. I wonder why there is such a large difference between men and women.
12. I wonder why digital communication formats are not more popular.
13. In the last few years, culture has emphasized digital communication.
14. Digital communication is at the forefront of connection.
15. The highest usage of texting is about 70 percent.
16. This fact is interesting.
17. This relates to my community.
18. I am a member of the polled demographic.
19. My peers use texting and messaging as the main methods of communication with our families.
20. I use texting and messaging as the main methods of communication with my family.
21. This indicates how my generation chooses to communicate.
22. A possible title is "buzz buzz Answer, it is your parents".
